reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and challenging assignments. Dr. Johnson really knows her stuff!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex concepts easy to understand. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Good content, but lectures can be a bit dry. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Best professor I've had! Engaging, knowledgeable, and always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. Needs to improve explanation of complex topics.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Clear explanations and interesting lab work. Could improve on feedback timing.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher who brings literature to life. Discussions are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Challenging course that prepares you well for the field. Prof. Brown is approachable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Makes art history fascinating for everyone.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Lectures are disorganized. Expectations for assignments are often unclear.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging course with relevant, real-world applications. Field trips are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking content, but can be overly critical of student opinions.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant lecturer who makes complex topics accessible. Always available for help.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Tough but fair. Projects are challenging and prepare you well for the industry.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Nguyen's enthusiasm is contagious!

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good real-world examples, but could improve on student engagement in class.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Insightful lectures and interesting fieldwork opportunities. Assignments can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher who breaks down complex musical concepts clearly. Very inspiring!
